Member Function Documentation

add ( $  key,
$  value = null,
$  rulePattern = null 
)

Adds an item into the collection.

Items consist of a key and a value. The value passed in here may either be an actual value for your key or you may pass in an array where the format is as follows:

array( <actual_value>, <rules_pattern> )

Please see CPSOption for rule pattern definitions.

Parameters:
string $key key
mixed $rulePattern value rules
mixed $value An optional value
See also:
CPSOption

Definition at line 53 of file CPSOptionCollection.php.

    {
        //  Already here?
        if ( $this->contains( $key ) )
            $this->setOption( $key, $value );
        else
        {
            //  Add to the collection
            $_option = new CPSOption( $key, $value, $rulePattern );
            parent::add( $_option->getName(), $_option );
        }
    }

addOptions ( $  options = array()  ) 

Adds an array of options to the collection. Array should be key/pattern pairs:

array( 'key' => 'pattern', ..., )

Where:

key = Name of option pattern = Rule pattern

Parameters:
array $options
See also:
add
CPSOptionHelper::parseRulePattern()

Implements IPSOptionContainer.

getOptions ( $  publicOnly = false,
$  optionFilter = array() 
)

Returns options in an array.

Parameters:
boolean If true, only returns non-private options
array $optionFilter Only options named in this array will be returned
Returns:
array

Definition at line 209 of file CPSOptionCollection.php.

    {
        $_optionList = array();
        if ( empty( $optionFilter ) ) $optionFilter = null;

        foreach ( $this as $_key => $_option )
        {
            if ( $publicOnly && $_option->getIsPrivate() )
                continue;

            if ( $optionFilter && !in_array( $_key, $optionFilter ) )
                continue;

            $_optionList[ $_key ] = $_option->getValue();
        }

        return $_optionList;
    }

toArray ( $  publicOnly = false,
$  optionFilter = array() 
)

Return this as an array

Parameters:
boolean $publicOnly
array $optionFilter
Returns:
array

Definition at line 101 of file CPSOptionCollection.php.

    {
        $_result = array();
        if ( array() === $optionFilter ) $optionFilter = null;

        $_data = parent::toArray();

        foreach ( $_data as $_key => $_option )
        {
            if ( $publicOnly && $_option->getIsPrivate() )
                continue;

            if ( $optionFilter && ! in_array( $_key, $optionFilter ) )
                continue;

            $_result[$_key] = $_option;
        }

        return $_result;
    }
